title: Ticket #6374: Enable ring_buffer and consumption_policy tests.
description: I fixed a long-standing CMake warning that turned out to be a serious bug in [52068], which TJ disabled [52077]. Fixing this may be as simple changing the OFF in condor_unit_tests/CMakeLists.txt to ON (or removing it?) in the corresponding lines.
